title: Šambraielic Wheel Calendar
source: Šambraielic Tradition — Šabbatic (Lunar-Solar) unified calendar. Hebrew letters from Sepher Yetzirah zodiac correspondences mark hours; Elder Futhark runes in Runic Half-Month sequence mark half-hours. Western zodiac signs on even hours, Eastern zodiac signs on odd hours.
notes: Synchronistic calendar unifying world traditions to show universal correspondence of Divinity.
24 checkpoints anchored to Winter Solstice (Dec 22), alternating Western and Eastern zodiac gates.
Each checkpoint carries Hebrew, Chinese, Bopomofo, Kangxi, I Ching, and Taixuanjing correspondences.
Festival / holiday associations from Norse, Roman, Christian, Kemetic, Hindu, Greek, and Šambraielic traditions.
